root.name: Zybex
root.description: AboutZybex is a side scrolling Shoot 'Em Up released on the Commodore 64, Commodore 128, Atari 8-bit and ZX Spectrum by Zeppelin Games Limited in 1989.PlotThe player controls one of two characters, Rinser and Cassalana, convicts trying to escape execution in an intergalactic prison.
